exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin width="640" height="1138" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15bbec0a4de"/>
	<e:Image width="640" height="1138" x="0" y="0.01" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="bg2_jpg"/>
	<e:Group width="640" height="1138" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Button id="btnReturn" label="返回主页" x="12.21" y="4.97" anchorOffsetX="0" width="142.42" anchorOffsetY="0" height="46.97" enabled="true"/>
		<e:Group width="640" height="1000" x="0" y="81" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<e:TextInput id="txtStartTime" width="110" height="50" x="156" y="63" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
			<e:TextInput id="txtName" width="216" height="50" x="160" y="143" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
			<e:TextInput id="txtPeriod" width="210" height="50" x="160" y="219" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
			<e:Label text="开始时间" x="22" y="75" textColor="0xf70221" anchorOffsetX="0" width="124"/>
			<e:Label text="名字" x="66" y="155" textColor="0xF70221" anchorOffsetX="0" width="86"/>
			<e:Label text="比赛时长" x="20" y="235" textColor="0xF70221" anchorOffsetX="0" width="126" anchorOffsetY="0" height="28"/>
			<e:Button id="btnCreateGame" label="创建比赛" x="470" y="65" anchorOffsetY="0" height="200"/>
			<e:Button id="btnStopGame" label="中止比赛" x="72" y="335" anchorOffsetX="0" width="420" anchorOffsetY="0" height="84"/>
			<e:Button id="btnCleanGame" label="清空比赛" x="74" y="445" anchorOffsetX="0" width="420" anchorOffsetY="0" height="84"/>
			<e:TextInput id="txtMoreTime" width="62" height="48" x="306" y="63" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
			<e:Label text="+" x="276" y="75" textColor="0x0a0909" anchorOffsetX="0" width="54" anchorOffsetY="0" height="52"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin width="640" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" source="matchInfo2_png"/>
	<e:Label id="txtMatchName" text="{data.matchName}" x="5.33" y="20.67" anchorOffsetX="0" width="211.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="40.67" textColor="0x0432f9" size="25"/>
	<e:Label id="txtStartTime" text="{data.startTime}" x="221.66" y="19.34" anchorOffsetX="0" width="181.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="52.67" textColor="0x0432F9" size="25"/>
	<e:Button id="btnJoinGame" label="加入游戏" x="421" y="20" anchorOffsetX="0" width="110" anchorOffsetY="0" height="35"/>
	<e:Button id="btnQueryResult" label="查看成绩" x="537.96" y="19.26" anchorOffsetX="0.96" anchorOffsetY="-0.74" width="96" height="37"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin width="640" height="1138" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15bbec0a4de"/>
	<e:Image width="640" height="1138" x="0" y="0.01" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="bg2_jpg"/>
	<e:Group width="640" height="569" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Button id="btnReturn" label="返回主页" x="12.21" y="4.97" anchorOffsetX="0" width="142.42" anchorOffsetY="0" height="46.97" enabled="true"/>
		<e:Scroller width="640" height="1012" x="0" y="54" anchorOffsetY="0" skinName="skins.VScrollBarSkin">
			<e:Group x="-2" y="-2" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" width="640" height="424">
				<e:Label text="比赛信息" x="220.91" y="10.94" textColor="0xf41107" size="45" fontFamily="Arial"/>
				<e:List id="listMatchs" width="640" height="1010.79" x="2" y="4" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" itemRendererSkinName="skins.VScrollBarSkin" touchEnabled="true">
					<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
					</e:layout>
				</e:List>
				<e:Button id="btnJoinMatch" label="加入比赛" x="206" y="326" anchorOffsetX="0" width="174" anchorOffsetY="0" height="60"/>
				<e:Button id="btnQueryMatchRes" label="查询比赛" x="210" y="224" anchorOffsetX="0" width="174" anchorOffsetY="0" height="60"/>
				<e:Button id="btnQueryBonus" label="名次查询" x="202" y="440" anchorOffsetX="0" width="174" anchorOffsetY="0" height="60"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin width="640" height="1138" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="640" height="1138" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Label text="手机号📱：" x="10" y="499" italic="true" textColor="0x090a0a" anchorOffsetX="0" width="292" anchorOffsetY="0" height="72" size="60"/>
	<e:Label text="用户名" x="29" y="385" italic="true" textColor="0x000000" anchorOffsetX="0" width="206" anchorOffsetY="0" height="72" size="60"/>
	<e:TextInput id="txtUserName" width="354.55" height="75" x="240" y="378" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" enabled="true"/>
	<e:TextInput id="txtPhone" width="354.55" height="75" x="257" y="485" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" enabled="true"/>
	<e:Button id="btnLogin" label="登陆" x="107" y="637" anchorOffsetX="0" width="407" anchorOffsetY="0" height="76"/>
	<e:Button id="btnReg" label="注册" x="113" y="735" anchorOffsetX="0" width="395" anchorOffsetY="0" height="90"/>
	<e:Label id="textMsg" text="" x="46" y="876" anchorOffsetX="0" width="526" anchorOffsetY="0" height="174" textColor="0xf90707" size="45"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin width="640" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15b9b5e8cc2"/>
	<e:Image width="621.33" height="472" x="3.01" y="7" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="showBox_png" rotation="359.88"/>
	<e:Button id="btnHomeBack" label="返回主页" x="405.68" y="356.33"/>
	<e:Button id="btnRetry" label="再来一次" y="356.34" left="132"/>
	<e:Label id="txtValue" text="0" x="237.33" y="157.01" anchorOffsetX="0" width="195.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="78" textColor="0xfc0000" size="80"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin width="640" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15b9b5e8cc2"/>
	<e:Image width="621.33" height="472" x="3.01" y="7" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="showBox_png" rotation="359.88"/>
	<e:Button id="btnReturn" label="返回主页" x="121.68" y="357.33" anchorOffsetX="0" width="380"/>
	<e:Label id="txtValue" text="0" x="237.33" y="157.01" anchorOffsetX="0" width="195.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="78" textColor="0xfc0000" size="80"/>
	<e:Label id="txtNameList" text="" x="75.33" y="254.01" anchorOffsetX="0" width="423.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="78" textColor="0xFC0000" size="30"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>
